fr.ecp.IS1220.myVelib.core

Interface Card

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Standard, Vlibre, Vmax

    public interface Card
    This interface represents a card/subscription.
    Author:
    Valentin

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double cost(Duration duration, java.lang.String bicycleType)
      Returns the cost of a ride of given duration and bicycle type, taking into account the specifications of the type of card and the time credit balance of the user.
      Date getCreationDate() 
      java.lang.String getType() 
      User getUser() 
      int timeCreditOperation(Duration duration, java.lang.String bicycleType, boolean plusStation)
      Returns the algebraic amount of time credit earned by the user at the end of a ride of given duration and bicycle type, taking into account the specifications the type of card, the time credit balance of the user and the eventual Plus bonus.

    • Method Detail

      • getUser

        User getUser()
        Returns:
        owner of the card

      • getCreationDate

        Date getCreationDate()
        Returns:
        date of creation of the card

      • getType

        java.lang.String getType()
        Returns:
        type of the card

      • cost

        double cost(Duration duration,
            java.lang.String bicycleType)
        Returns the cost of a ride of given duration and bicycle type, taking into account the specifications of the type of card and the time credit balance of the user.
        Parameters:
        duration - duration of the ride
        bicycleType - type of bicycle used for the ride
        Returns:
        cost of the ride

      • timeCreditOperation

        int timeCreditOperation(Duration duration,
                        java.lang.String bicycleType,
                        boolean plusStation)
        Returns the algebraic amount of time credit earned by the user at the end of a ride of given duration and bicycle type, taking into account the specifications the type of card, the time credit balance of the user and the eventual Plus bonus.
        Parameters:
        duration - duration of the ride
        bicycleType - type of bicycle used for the ride
        plusStation - type of the return station, true if Plus and false otherwise
        Returns:
        a int that correspond to the time gain with the ride
